title: Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki
content:
otes: SSD required

When will Baldur's Gate 3 be released?

Baldur's Gate 3 is released for the PC on the 3rd of August, 2023, and on the 6th of September for PlayStation 5.

Early Access for the game was projected to be available to the public on September 30, 2020, but was later delayed to October 6, 2020. The game was then announced to have it's full release on August 31st, 2023. This date would later be sped up to August 3, 2023 for the Windows and Mac version, and delayed to September 6, 20
